features: √√【HIGH QUALITY DRIP BOWL】: WB32X10013 WB32X10012 ge drip pans for electric stove are used to catch water ,oil and food that falls when cooking on the oven to make sure nothing drips onto the flame, keeping it safe. Electric stove drip pans can fit the stove properly and thus preventing cookware from rocking on the stove. Burner Ring Trim WB32X10012 WB31X5013 provides a decorative edge to the hotpoint drip pans. This drip bowls for electric stove are made of durable Steel with chrome finish. Durable, stick free, easy to clean, dishwasher safe. If you're having problems with your electric burner drip pans, replacing this WB32X10013 WB32X10012 stove burner drip pan will do the trick.

√√ 【6" & 8" Electric Drip Pans & Ring D Kit 】:WB32X10013 WB32X10012 Electric Stove Burner Drip Bowl Kit includes 4 Pcs Stove Drip pans and 4 Pcs Ring for Electric Range. 1 x 8-inch WB32X10013 hotpoint stove drip pans with 1 x 8-inch WB31X5014 Chrome Burner Ring and 3 x 6-inch WB32X10012 general electric stove drip pans with 3 x 6-inch WB31X5013 Ring Trim, totally 8 pack burner drip pans. WB32X10013 WB32X10012 drip pans is Chrome Plated Steel burner pans for electric stove ,silver,using eco-friendly plating techniques. Each ge stove drip pans is made of steel with chrome finish. √√【HIGH COMPATIBILITY】: WB32X10012 WB32X10013 Range Stove Top Drip Pan Bowl for electric stove is fit for General Electric ,Hotpoint stove burner. √√ 【STURDY & DURABLE DRIP PANS】: WB32X10013 WB32X10012 range burner drip pans and WB31X5013 WB31X5014 Chrome Burner Rings made from durable steel with chrome finish,using eco-friendly plating techniques,sliver. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What you will get when you buy this Electric Stove Burner Drip Pans set？ This 6" & 8" Burner Drip Pans & Ring D Kit includes 1 Large 8 Inch WB32X10013 Drip Pans with 8-inch WB31X5014 Chrome Burner Ring,3 Small 6 Inch WB32X10012 Chrome Range Drip Pans with 3 WB31X5013 Range Burner Ring ,totally 8 pack. What material is this Drip Pans & Ring D kit made of? WB32X10012 WB32X10013 Range Drip Pan Bowl with Trim Rings is Chrome Plated Steel drip bowl. And made from durable steel with chrome finish,using plating techniques.Color is silver. How to unhook the orignai decorative rin to put on the new？ First wait for cooling, remove the burner element,straight back to remove then pick up the outer ring and then reach down and pull up the pan.If the ring is attached to the burner, then you have to replace the ring and burner as one assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fir our 40-year old GE stove perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product nice and sturdy. It first arrived incomplete missing one big set and 1 extra small set. I wrote company and they sent me a whole new set. Thank you so much!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fit not perfect
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t all the way fit right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for an old stove.
reviews.reviewText: Pro tip: the drip pan goes BELOW the ring, not on top. You will think it goes on top, because then it looks like all the one-piece options, but no, you will end up with wonky burners that won't lay down flat. Lay in the drip pan first, plug in the burner, then wiggle the ring over & under the burner. Viola, perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sadly didn’t fit
reviews.reviewText: Tried to use these rings on a much older stove top. No problem with the rings except not compatible sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfect for the oven in our mobile home. Hard to find the right size.
